author: jstrachan
msg: A patch so that the test plugin can use the test classes directory -  rather than just the test source code directory - for searching for unit test cases to run.
The default behaviour remains unchanged - however this new feature allows other languages which compile down to bytecode - like Groovy - to be used and found by the default unit test run.
This mechanism could also be useful if other test classes are copied or code generated into the target/test-classes directory etc.

author: vmassol
msg: Migrated the plugin to use the new statcvs-xml jar (which generates XML xdoc output instead of HTML).
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: vmassol
msg: Releasing version 1.2 of the statcvs plugin
